message_help:
Help :
``*schedule [date] [time] [channel] [message]``

Schedule a delayed sending of a message.
The date and time must be in the following format ``YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS``
confirm_schedule: Your message (ID : **{idMessage}**) has been scheduled to be published in the channel {channel} on {date} at {time} ! :ok_hand:
date_time_later: The date/time must be later than the current date/time
message_not_found: This message could not be found. List of messages : ``*schedulelist``
help_delete:
Help :
``*scheduledelete [id]``

Delete an existing message by its id. List of messages : ``*schedulelist``
confirm_delete: The message with ID **{idMessage}** has been removed from the list :ok_hand:
confirm_clear: All of schedule messages are removed successfully ! :ok_hand:
